title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.01 - City of Syracuse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.01 - City of Syracuse

State Regulations
(a) Route 298, Bear Street Arterial, FAC 59-4, between IR 81 and IR 690. (b) East Hiawatha Boulevard between Seventh

North Street and Sixth North Street; provided, however, that this route shall
only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through

Friday. Use of the route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (c) Sixth North Street
between East Hiawatha Boulevard and the end of Sixth North Street; provided, however, that this route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6
p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of the route will be permitted all
day Saturday and Sunday. (d) Old

State Fair Boulevard between IR 690 (exit 4) entrance ramp and West Hiawatha

Boulevard; provided, however, that this route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to
3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of this route will
be permitted all day Saturday and Sunday. (e) West Hiawatha Boulevard between IR 690
(exit 4) off-ramp and Park Street; provided, however, that this route shall
only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through

Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (f) Park Street between IR
81 (exit 23) off-ramp and Hiawatha Boulevard; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (g) Solar Street between

Hiawatha Boulevard and Spencer Street; provided, however, that this route shall
only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through

Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (h) Court Street between

Sunset Street and Kirkpatrick Street; provided, however, that this route shall
only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through

Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (i) Sunset Street between

Route 298, Bear Street, and Danforth Street; provided, however, that this route
shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday
through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (j) North Geddes Street
between IR 690 (exit 5) on-ramp and Kirkpatrick Street; provided, however, that
this route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (k) Kirkpatrick Street
between North Geddes Street and Court Street; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (l) Spencer Street between

Van Rensselaer Street and Genant Drive; provided, however, that this route
shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday
through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (m) Genant Drive between

Route 298, Bear Street, and West Division Street; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and

Sunday. (o) Seventh North Street
between East Hiawatha Boulevard and Brewerton Road in the City of

Syracuse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8131.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
